headline: Evergy urges safety around electricity this Memorial Day Weekend
summary: Kansas City - Memorial Day Weekend is approaching, and many people will spend it outdoors.Evergy is reminding customers to enjoy their outdoor plans safely, especially around electricity.Here are...

headline: Evergy: A Terrific Utility Pick To Sleep Well At Night
summary: Over the last 2 decades, Evergy has proven itself to be a qualitative dividend grower. The electric utility reaffirmed its 4% to 6% annual EPS growth outlook. Read more about the stock here.
